verses.verse: And the king <WH4428> sent, <WH7971> and they gathered <WH622> unto <WH413> him all <WH3605> the elders <WH2205> of Judah <WH3063> and of Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And the king <WH4428> went up <WH5927> into the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> and all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063> and all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389> with <WH854> him, and the priests, <WH3548> and the prophets, <WH5030> and all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> both small <WH4480> <WH6996> and great: <WH1419> and he read <WH7121> in their ears <WH241> <WH853> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of the book <WH5612> of the covenant <WH1285> which was found <WH4672> in the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And the king <WH4428> stood <WH5975> by <WH5921> a pillar, <WH5982> and made <WH3772> <WH853> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> to walk <WH1980> after <WH310> the LORD, <WH3068> and to keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687> and his testimonies <WH5715> and his statutes <WH2708> with all <WH3605> their heart <WH3820> and all <WH3605> their soul, <WH5315> to perform <WH6965> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> covenant <WH1285> that were written <WH3789> in <WH5921> this <WH2088> book. <WH5612> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> stood <WH5975> to the covenant. <WH1285>

And the king <WH4428> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Hilkiah <WH2518> the high <WH1419> priest, <WH3548> and the priests <WH3548> of the second order, <WH4932> and the keepers <WH8104> of the door, <WH5592> to bring forth <WH3318> out of the temple <WH4480> <WH1964> of the LORD <WH3068> <WH853> all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> that were made <WH6213> for Baal, <WH1168> and for the grove, <WH842> and for all <WH3605> the host <WH6635> of heaven: <WH8064> and he burned <WH8313> them without <WH4480> <WH2351> Jerusalem <WH3389> in the fields <WH7709> of Kidron, <WH6939> and carried <WH5375> <WH853> the ashes <WH6083> of them unto Bethel. <WH1008>

And he put down <WH7673> <WH853> the idolatrous priests, <WH3649> whom <WH834> the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> had ordained <WH5414> to burn incense <WH6999> in the high places <WH1116> in the cities <WH5892> of Judah, <WH3063> and in the places round about <WH4524> Jerusalem; <WH3389> them also that burned incense <WH6999> unto Baal, <WH1168> to the sun, <WH8121> and to the moon, <WH3394> and to the planets, <WH4208> and to all <WH3605> the host <WH6635> of heaven. <WH8064>

And he brought out <WH3318> <WH853> the grove <WH842> from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> without <WH4480> <WH2351> Jerusalem, <WH3389> unto <WH413> the brook <WH5158> Kidron, <WH6939> and burned <WH8313> it at the brook <WH5158> Kidron, <WH6939> and stamped it small <WH1854> to powder, <WH6083> and cast <WH7993> <WH853> the powder <WH6083> thereof upon <WH5921> the graves <WH6913> of the children <WH1121> of the people. <WH5971>

And he broke down <WH5422> <WH853> the houses <WH1004> of the sodomites, <WH6945> that <WH834> were by the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> where <WH834> <WH8033> the women <WH802> wove <WH707> hangings <WH1004> for the grove. <WH842>

And he brought <WH935> <WH853> all <WH3605> the priests <WH3548> out of the cities <WH4480> <WH5892> of Judah, <WH3063> and defiled <WH2930> <WH853> the high places <WH1116> where <WH834> <WH8033> the priests <WH3548> had burned incense, <WH6999> from Geba <WH4480> <WH1387> to <WH5704> Beer-sheba, <WH884> and broke down <WH5422> <WH853> the high places <WH1116> of the gates <WH8179> that <WH834> were in the entering in <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> of Joshua <WH3091> the governor <WH8269> of the city, <WH5892> which <WH834> were on <WH5921> a man's <WH376> left hand <WH8040> at the gate <WH8179> of the city. <WH5892>

Nevertheless <WH389> the priests <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116> came not up <WH5927> <WH3808> to <WH413> the altar <WH4196> of the LORD <WH3068> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> but <WH3588> <WH518> they did eat <WH398> of the unleavened bread <WH4682> among <WH8432> their brethren. <WH251>

And he defiled <WH2930> <WH853> Topheth, <WH8612> which <WH834> is in the valley <WH1516> of the children <WH1121> of Hinnom, <WH2011> that no <WH1115> man <WH376> might make <WH853> his son <WH1121> or his daughter <WH1323> to pass through <WH5674> the fire <WH784> to Molech. <WH4432>

And he took away <WH7673> <WH853> the horses <WH5483> that <WH834> the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> had given <WH5414> to the sun, <WH8121> at the entering in <WH4480> <WH935> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> by <WH413> the chamber <WH3957> of Nathan-melech <WH5419> the chamberlain, <WH5631> which <WH834> was in the suburbs, <WH6503> and burned <WH8313> the chariots <WH4818> of the sun <WH8121> with fire. <WH784>

And the altars <WH4196> that <WH834> were on <WH5921> the top <WH1406> of the upper chamber <WH5944> of Ahaz, <WH271> which <WH834> the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> had made, <WH6213> and the altars <WH4196> which <WH834> Manasseh <WH4519> had made <WH6213> in the two <WH8147> courts <WH2691> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> did the king <WH4428> beat down, <WH5422> and broke them down <WH7323> from thence, <WH4480> <WH8033> and cast <WH7993> <WH853> the dust <WH6083> of them into <WH413> the brook <WH5158> Kidron. <WH6939>

And the high places <WH1116> that <WH834> were before <WH5921> <WH6440> Jerusalem, <WH3389> which <WH834> were on the right hand <WH4480> <WH3225> of the mount <WH2022> of corruption, <WH4889> which <WH834> Solomon <WH8010> the king <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478> had built <WH1129> for Ashtoreth <WH6253> the abomination <WH8251> of the Zidonians, <WH6722> and for Chemosh <WH3645> the abomination <WH8251> of the Moabites, <WH4124> and for Milcom <WH4445> the abomination <WH8441> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> did the king <WH4428> defile. <WH2930>

And he broke in pieces <WH7665> <WH853> the images, <WH4676> and cut down <WH3772> <WH853> the groves, <WH842> and filled <WH4390> <WH853> their places <WH4725> with the bones <WH6106> of men. <WH120>

Moreover <WH1571> <WH853> the altar <WH4196> that <WH834> was at Bethel, <WH1008> and the high place <WH1116> which <WH834> Jeroboam <WH3379> the son <WH1121> of Nebat, <WH5028> who <WH834> made <WH853> Israel <WH3478> to sin, <WH2398> had made, <WH6213> both <WH1571> <WH853> that <WH1931> altar <WH4196> and the high place <WH1116> he broke down, <WH5422> and burned <WH8313> <WH853> the high place, <WH1116> and stamped it small <WH1854> to powder, <WH6083> and burned <WH8313> the grove. <WH842>

And as Josiah <WH2977> turned <WH6437> himself, he spied <WH7200> <WH853> the sepulchers <WH6913> that <WH834> were there <WH8033> in the mount, <WH2022> and sent, <WH7971> and took <WH3947> <WH853> the bones <WH6106> out of <WH4480> the sepulchers, <WH6913> and burned <WH8313> them upon <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> and polluted <WH2930> it, according to the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> which <WH834> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> proclaimed, <WH7121> who <WH834> proclaimed <WH7121> <WH853> these <WH428> words. <WH1697>

Then he said, <WH559> What <WH4100> title <WH6725> is that <WH1975> that <WH834> I <WH589> see? <WH7200> And the men <WH376> of the city <WH5892> told <WH559> <WH413> him, It is the sepulcher <WH6913> of the man <WH376> of God, <WH430> which <WH834> came <WH935> from Judah, <WH4480> <WH3063> and proclaimed <WH7121> <WH853> these <WH428> things <WH1697> that <WH834> thou hast done <WH6213> against <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> of Bethel. <WH1008>

And he said, <WH559> Let him alone; <WH5117> let no <WH408> man <WH376> move <WH5128> his bones. <WH6106> So they let his bones alone, <WH4422> <WH6106> with <WH854> the bones <WH6106> of the prophet <WH5030> that <WH834> came <WH935> out of Samaria. <WH4480> <WH8111>

And <WH853> all <WH3605> the houses <WH1004> also <WH1571> of the high places <WH1116> that <WH834> were in the cities <WH5892> of Samaria, <WH8111> which <WH834> the kings <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478> had made <WH6213> to provoke the LORD to anger, <WH3707> Josiah <WH2977> took away, <WH5493> and did <WH6213> to them according to all <WH3605> the acts <WH4639> that <WH834> he had done <WH6213> in Bethel. <WH1008>

And he slew <WH2076> <WH853> all <WH3605> the priests <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116> that <WH834> were there <WH8033> upon <WH5921> the altars, <WH4196> and burned <WH8313> <WH853> men's <WH120> bones <WH6106> upon <WH5921> them, and returned <WH7725> to Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And the king <WH4428> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> Keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> unto the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> as it is written <WH3789> in <WH5921> the book <WH5612> of this <WH2088> covenant. <WH1285>

Surely <WH3588> there was not <WH3808> holden <WH6213> such <WH2088> a passover <WH6453> from the days <WH4480> <WH3117> of the judges <WH8199> that <WH834> judged <WH8199> <WH853> Israel, <WH3478> nor in all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of the kings <WH4428> of Israel, <WH3478> nor of the kings <WH4428> of Judah; <WH3063>

But <WH3588> <WH518> in the eighteenth <WH8083> <WH6240> year <WH8141> of king <WH4428> Josiah, <WH2977> wherein this <WH2088> passover <WH6453> was holden <WH6213> to the LORD <WH3068> in Jerusalem. <WH3389>

Moreover <WH1571> <WH853> the workers with familiar spirits, <WH178> and the wizards, <WH3049> and the images, <WH8655> and the idols, <WH1544> and all <WH3605> the abominations <WH8251> that <WH834> were spied <WH7200> in the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063> and in Jerusalem, <WH3389> did Josiah <WH2977> put away, <WH1197> that <WH4616> he might perform <WH6965> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of the law <WH8451> which were written <WH3789> in <WH5921> the book <WH5612> that <WH834> Hilkiah <WH2518> the priest <WH3548> found <WH4672> in the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And like unto him <WH3644> was <WH1961> there no <WH3808> king <WH4428> before <WH6440> him, that <WH834> turned <WH7725> to <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> with all <WH3605> his heart, <WH3824> and with all <WH3605> his soul, <WH5315> and with all <WH3605> his might, <WH3966> according to all <WH3605> the law <WH8451> of Moses; <WH4872> neither <WH3808> after <WH310> him arose <WH6965> there any like him. <WH3644>

Notwithstanding <WH389> the LORD <WH3068> turned <WH7725> not <WH3808> from the fierceness <WH4480> <WH2740> of his great <WH1419> wrath, <WH639> wherewith <WH834> his anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> against Judah, <WH3063> because <WH5921> of all <WH3605> the provocations <WH3708> that <WH834> Manasseh <WH4519> had provoked <WH3707> him withal.

And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> I will remove <WH5493> <WH853> Judah <WH3063> also <WH1571> out of <WH4480> <WH5921> my sight, <WH6440> as <WH834> I have removed <WH5493> <WH853> Israel, <WH3478> and will cast off <WH3988> <WH853> this <WH2063> city <WH5892> <WH853> Jerusalem <WH3389> which <WH834> I have chosen, <WH977> and the house <WH1004> of which <WH834> I said, <WH559> My name <WH8034> shall be <WH1961> there. <WH8033>

Now the rest <WH3499> of the acts <WH1697> of Josiah, <WH2977> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> he did, <WH6213> are they <WH1992> not <WH3808> written <WH3789> in <WH5921> the book <WH5612> of the chronicles <WH1697> <WH3117> of the kings <WH4428> of Judah? <WH3063>

In his days <WH3117> Pharaoh Necho <WH6549> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> went up <WH5927> against <WH5921> the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> to <WH5921> the river <WH5104> Euphrates: <WH6578> and king <WH4428> Josiah <WH2977> went <WH1980> against <WH7122> him; and he slew <WH4191> him at Megiddo, <WH4023> when he had seen <WH7200> him.

And his servants <WH5650> carried <WH7392> him in a chariot dead <WH4191> from Megiddo, <WH4480> <WH4023> and brought <WH935> him to Jerusalem, <WH3389> and buried <WH6912> him in his own sepulcher. <WH6900> And the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> took <WH3947> <WH853> Jehoahaz <WH3059> the son <WH1121> of Josiah, <WH2977> and anointed <WH4886> him, and made him king <WH4427> <WH853> in his father's stead. <WH8478> <WH1>

Jehoahaz <WH3059> was twenty <WH6242> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he began to reign; <WH4427> and he reigned <WH4427> three <WH7969> months <WH2320> in Jerusalem. <WH3389> And his mother's <WH517> name <WH8034> was Hamutal, <WH2537> the daughter <WH1323> of Jeremiah <WH3414> of Libnah. <WH4480> <WH3841>
And he did <WH6213> that which was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD, <WH3068> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> his fathers <WH1> had done. <WH6213>

And Pharaoh Necho <WH6549> put him in bands <WH631> at Riblah <WH7247> in the land <WH776> of Hamath, <WH2574> that he might not reign <WH4480> <WH4427> in Jerusalem; <WH3389> and put <WH5414> <WH5921> the land <WH776> to a tribute <WH6066> of a hundred <WH3967> talents <WH3603> of silver, <WH3701> and a talent <WH3603> of gold. <WH2091>

And Pharaoh Necho <WH6549> made <WH4427> <WH853> Eliakim <WH471> the son <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> king <WH4427> in the room <WH8478> of Josiah <WH2977> his father, <WH1> and turned <WH5437> <WH853> his name <WH8034> to Jehoiakim, <WH3079> and took <WH3947> Jehoahaz <WH3059> away: and he came <WH935> to Egypt, <WH4714> and died <WH4191> there. <WH8033>

And Jehoiakim <WH3079> gave <WH5414> the silver <WH3701> and the gold <WH2091> to Pharaoh; <WH6547> but <WH389> he taxed <WH6186> <WH853> the land <WH776> to give <WH5414> <WH853> the money <WH3701> according <WH5921> to the commandment <WH6310> of Pharaoh: <WH6547> he exacted <WH5065> <WH853> the silver <WH3701> and the gold <WH2091> of <WH853> the people <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> of every one <WH376> according to his taxation, <WH6187> to give <WH5414> it unto Pharaoh Necho. <WH6549>

Jehoiakim <WH3079> was twenty <WH6242> and five <WH2568> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he began to reign; <WH4427> and he reigned <WH4427> eleven <WH259> <WH6240> years <WH8141> in Jerusalem. <WH3389> And his mother's <WH517> name <WH8034> was Zebudah, <WH2080> the daughter <WH1323> of Pedaiah <WH6305> of <WH4480> Rumah. <WH7316>
And he did <WH6213> that which was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD, <WH3068> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> his fathers <WH1> had done. <WH6213>
